moments.quote: The alterations were done to cover up the incompleteness of documents but the contents were factual.
moments.speaker: Minister (PUB)
moments.why_viral: Minimizes document falsification - sounds like cover-up language

moments.quote: It is challenging for the government to allocate COEs based on needs. No matter how one draws the line, there will always be people who believe they are more deserving.
moments.speaker: Transport Minister
moments.why_viral: Admits difficulty but uses it as reason for inaction - excuse-making rather than problem-solving

moments.quote: The market mechanism is transparent and allows government to channel COE revenues to benefit the wider public.
moments.speaker: Transport Minister
moments.why_viral: Defends market-based system as fair while acknowledging it prices out families - contradictory logic
